pageContext.claim: “Not to talk badly about the other administration, but if that theory went forward, with Crooked Hillary winning the election, instead of being up almost 50 percent with the stock market you would have been down 50 percent. It was heading down. It was going to be a disaster.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump inherited a growing economy from President Barack Obama, and that growth has continued under his watch. There's no evidence or reputable expert saying the U.S. economy would have tanked under a Democratic president.
